meanings.definition: To cause (bacteria, yeast, etc.) to form flocculent masses.
meanings.sent1: The chemical agent is flocculating the bacteria in the water sample.
meanings.sent2: The addition of the coagulant is flocculating the particles in the solution.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous scientist accidentally spilled the flocculating powder into the petri dish.
meanings.sent4: Her words had a flocculating effect on the group, bringing them together in agreement.
meanings.sent5: The magician's wand seemed to have the power of flocculating objects at will.
